decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing Retraction Helix in combination with various creatures and spells to generate powerful combos and control the game. By bouncing key pieces back to hand or triggering abilities multiple times, the deck aims to create an advantage and manipulate the board state to its advantage. The cards in the deck are carefully selected to support this strategy and enable quick and devastating plays, making it a formidable competitor in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

The primary focus of this deck is to utilize a mixture of control spells and powerful creatures to outlast and overwhelm the opponent. The deck incorporates ramp spells like Growth Spiral and Lotus Cobra to quickly generate mana and cast threats such as Nissa, Resurgent Animist and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods. Memory Deluge and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide card advantage, while Yorion, Sky Nomad acts as a powerful companion to create additional value with flicker effects. Overall, the deck aims to control the board and win through its efficient threats and card advantage.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early, leveraging cards like Domri, Anarch of Bolas and Bard Class to generate value and maintain board presence. Torch the Tower and other removal spells help clear the way for the deck's creatures to push through damage. With a mix of efficient threats and disruptive spells, this deck aims to curve out well and deliver fast, consistent damage to secure victory.
